title: Wisdom of Father Brown - Chesterton, G. K
description: Gilbert Keith Chesterton is probably better known as a journalist and Catholic apologist.  Still, he had yet another successful career writing the mystery stories surrounding Father Brown and others with the hero, Mr. Pond.  Here is a collection of some of the Father Brown mysteries.  Written in the style established by Poe, and furthered by Doyle, his priest adds a Catholic touch, where the offender often avoids prison through confession.  After all, no one else can solve the mystery except Father Brown.
